english.segment1: Be the reason I live. Be my quest, my constant vision. Be the water I drink. The treasure I seek more than gold
english.segment2: Be the fire in my heart. My consuming love and passion. Be the air that I breathe. The song that I sing from my heart and soul
english.segment3: Jesus, Lord over all. Be the Lord over me. Jesus, drawn to this alter I come. Here is my heart. May Your will be done in me
